entry.title: The Science of Invisibility Cloaks - King's College London Christmas Lectures 2017

media:group.media:title: The Science of Invisibility Cloaks - King's College London Christmas Lectures 2017
media:group.media:description:
"Invisible Santa" Christmas Lectures for A-level and GCSE students. Francisco J. Rodríguez Fortuño (Paco)
Many thanks to Dr. Eva Philippaki and Michela Picardi for the construction of the lens invisibility cloak and helping out with the matching index demonstration.

entry.title: [MATRICES 1] What IS a MATRIX? Essence and Motivation

media:group.media:title: [MATRICES 1] What IS a MATRIX? Essence and Motivation
media:group.media:description:
What is a matrix? What are matrices used for? Why are they important? What are their applications? What do they represent?
This lecture introduces matrices as representing linear transformations of vectors. We define linear transformations, learn how to visualize them and how to describe them analytically, and then learn how they can be equivalent to a matrix multiplication. We give the general recipe and tricks to remember matrix-vector multiplication.
King's College London - Physics Programme - Year 1 Maths Video Lecture
CONTENTS: - Why are matrices important? [00:05] - What are transformations? [02:14] - What are linear transformations? Definition [04:09] - Scalar multiplication vs Matrix multiplication [06:48] - Visualization of 2D linear transformations [09:56] - Lines are transformed into lines [11:52] - Examples of 2D linear transformations [13:46] - Analytical description of linear transformations and visual interpretation [14:15] - Relation between linear transformation and matrix [20:13] - General matrix-vector multiplication [22:47 & 24:49] - Visual trick to remember matrix multiplication [27:00]
Francisco (Paco) Rodríguez Fortuño Senior Lecturer King's College London

media:group.media:title: [VECTOR SPACES 4] Function Vector Spaces
media:group.media:description:
Function Vector Spaces, functions are vectors, intuitive understanding, measuring distances, the inner product with functions, orthogonal functions, projecting functions onto functions.
King's College London - Physics Programme - Year 1 Maths Video Lecture
CONTENTS: - Functions f(x) fulfill vector space axioms [0:42] (see previous video to refresh vector space axioms https://youtu.be/lZXMNRKFqKk ) - Dimensions of a function vector space [2:33] - Interpretation of function vectors as sampled points [3:20] - Basis for function vector space - sampling approach, introduction to Dirac Delta [5:22] - Other basis for function vector space - powers of x [8:26] - Inner product for function vector space - Introduction & intuition [9:20] - Inner product for function vector space - Definition [13:17] - Length of a function vector - [14:02] - Orthogonality between functions - examples [14:39] - Other things to do with inner product between functions [15:59] - Summary of this video and previous one: Inner product summary [16:15]
Francisco (Paco) Rodríguez Fortuño Senior Lecturer King's College London

media:group.media:title: [VECTOR SPACES 3] Inner Product
media:group.media:description:
Inner Product, introduction, uses, orthogonal and orthonormal basis, obtaining vector components, and projecting vectors into subspaces.
King's College London - Physics Programme - Year 1 Maths Video Lecture
CONTENTS: - Vector Basis [0:33] - Intro to Inner Product [0:12] - Uses of Inner Product [1:31] - Orthogonal and orthonormal basis [2:29] - Obtaining vector components [4:50] - Projection of vector into subspace [12:00] - Inner product as generalization of dot product [16:04] - Axioms for inner product [16:37] & [17:20] - Dot product does not work on complex vectors [19:10] - Hermitian inner product [20:55] - Schwarz's and triangle inequalities [24:40] - Calculating inner product in terms of orthonormal basis components [26:25] - Note on different notations [31:00]
Francisco (Paco) Rodríguez Fortuño Senior Lecturer King's College London

entry.title: [VECTOR SPACES 1] Vector Basis, Span & Linear Independence

media:group.media:title: [VECTOR SPACES 1] Vector Basis, Span & Linear Independence
media:group.media:description:
Vector Basis, Span of a set of vectors & Linear Dependence and Independence of a set of vectors.
King's College London Physics Program Year 1 Maths Video Lecture
CONTENTS: - Vector Basis [0:33] - Span of a set of vectors [04:21] - Linear dependence and independence in 2D [09:33] - Linear dependence and independence in 3D [13:24] - Linear dependence and independence - definition [16:10] - Summary [23:25]
Francisco (Paco) Rodríguez Fortuño Senior Lecturer King's College London

media:group.media:title: [VECTOR SPACES 2] N-Dimensional Vector Spaces
media:group.media:description:
N-Dimensional Vector Spaces: examples (RGB colors, polynomials), vector space axioms, vector subspaces.
King's College London Physics Program Year 1 Maths Video Lecture
CONTENTS: - Example 1: RGB Colorspace [0:26] - Example 2: Polynomials as vectors [3:54] - Example 3: Videogame characters as vectors [6:16] - What is a vector? [7:02] - Introduction to axioms [9:14] - Vector space axioms [9:58] - Lines and planes as vector spaces [12:48] - Vector subspaces [16:31]
Francisco (Paco) Rodríguez Fortuño Senior Lecturer King's College London

media:group.media:title: [VECTORS 2] Equations of lines and planes
media:group.media:description:
Equations of lines and planes, calculation of distances
King's College London Physics Program Year 1 Maths Video Lecture
CONTENTS: - Equations of lines [0:18] - Operations of planes [8:47] - Calculation of distances [16:52]
Francisco (Paco) Rodríguez Fortuño Senior Lecturer King's College London

media:group.media:title: [VECTORS 1] Fundamental Properties of Vectors
media:group.media:description:
Fundamental Properties of Vectors - Refresher lecture - Fundamentals, Linear combinations, Dot product, Cross product.
King's College London Physics Programme Year 1 Maths Video Lecture
CONTENTS: - Fundamentals of vectors [0:10] - Operations on vectors [1:13] - Linear combinations of vectors [2:00] - Dot product [5:00] - Cross product [9:31] - Pseudovectors [14:19]
Francisco (Paco) Rodríguez Fortuño Senior Lecturer King's College London
